chalicelib package

Submodules

chalicelib.auth module

chalicelib.auth.decode_jwt_token(token)[source]

Decode and validate a JWT token.

This function decodes the provided JWT token and verifies its signature.

Parameters:

token – The JWT token string to decode and validate.

Returns:

The decoded payload of the JWT token.

Raises:

jwt.InvalidTokenError – If the token is invalid or has expired.

chalicelib.auth.get_jwt_token(username, password, record)[source]

Generate a JWT token for a user upon successful authentication.

This function verifies the provided password against the stored hash and, if valid, generates a JWT token for the user.

Parameters:

  • username – The username of the user.

  • password – The password provided by the user.

  • record – The user’s record from the database, containing hash information.

Returns:

A JWT token string if authentication is successful.

Raises:

UnauthorizedError – If the password is invalid.

chalicelib.db module

class chalicelib.db.DynamoDBTodo(table_resource)[source]

Bases: TodoDB

DynamoDB implementation of the TODO database.

This class provides a DynamoDB storage for TODO items.

add_item(description, metadata=None, username='default')[source]

Add a new TODO item for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • description – The description of the TODO item.

  • metadata – Optional metadata for the TODO item.

  • username – The username of the user. Defaults to ‘default’.

Returns:

The unique identifier (UID) of the newly added TODO item.

delete_item(uid, username='default')[source]

Delete a specific TODO item for a specific user by its unique identifier (UID).

Parameters:

  • uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

  • username – The username of the user. Defaults to ‘default’.

get_item(uid, username='default')[source]

Get a specific TODO item for a specific user by its unique identifier (UID).

Parameters:

  • uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

  • username – The username of the user. Defaults to ‘default’.

Returns:

The TODO item with the given UID.

list_all_items()[source]

List all TODO items for all users.

Returns:

A list of all TODO items.

list_items(username='default')[source]

List all TODO items for a specific user.

Parameters:

username – The username of the user. Defaults to ‘default’.

Returns:

A list of TODO items for the user.

update_item(uid, description=None, state=None, metadata=None, username='default')[source]

Update a specific TODO item for a specific user by its unique identifier (UID).

Parameters:

  • uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

  • description – Optional new description for the TODO item.

  • state – Optional new state for the TODO item.

  • metadata – Optional new metadata for the TODO item.

  • username – The username of the user. Defaults to ‘default’.

class chalicelib.db.InMemoryTodoDB(state=None)[source]

Bases: TodoDB

In-memory implementation of the TODO database.

This class provides an in-memory storage for TODO items, useful for testing and development.

class chalicelib.db.TodoDB[source]

Bases: object

Abstract base class for a TODO database.

This class defines the interface for managing TODO items.

add_item(description, metadata=None)[source]

Add a new TODO item.

This method should be implemented by subclasses to add a new TODO item.

Parameters:

  • description – The description of the TODO item.

  • metadata – Optional metadata for the TODO item.

delete_item(uid)[source]

Delete a specific TODO item by its unique identifier (UID).

This method should be implemented by subclasses to delete a TODO item.

Parameters:

uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

get_item(uid)[source]

Get a specific TODO item by its unique identifier (UID).

This method should be implemented by subclasses to return a TODO item.

Parameters:

uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

list_items()[source]

List all TODO items.

This method should be implemented by subclasses to return a list of TODO items.

update_item(uid, description=None, state=None, metadata=None)[source]

Update a specific TODO item by its unique identifier (UID).

This method should be implemented by subclasses to update a TODO item.

Parameters:

  • uid – The unique identifier of the TODO item.

  • description – Optional new description for the TODO item.

  • state – Optional new state for the TODO item.

  • metadata – Optional new metadata for the TODO item.
